doc:
Buddy Noonan https://en.wikipedia.org/wiki/Buddy_Noonan 0 Buddy Noonan (April 9, 1937 – July 3, 1989), born Earl Seely Noonan in Glendale, California was an American cinematographer, actor, entertainer, and television producer for nationally syndicated television series such as The Happy Wanderers, Wanderlust, and The Roving Kind, shot on location throughout the United States and Mexico. These were distributed by Bill Burrud Productions and originally aired on KCOP-TV in Los Angeles. Noonan appeared in episodes of the Treasure series, later re-run on The Discovery Channel. Buddy_Noonan ( April_9_,_1937 – July_3_,_1989 ) , born Earl_Seely_Noonan in Glendale , California was an_American_cinematographer , actor , entertainer , and television_producer for nationally_syndicated_television_series such_as The_Happy_Wanderers , Wanderlust , and The_Roving_Kind , shot on location throughout the_United_States_and_Mexico . These were_distributed by Bill_Burrud_Productions and originally_aired on KCOP-TV in Los_Angeles . Noonan appeared in episodes of the_Treasure_series , later_re-run on The_Discovery_Channel .
